title: Cognitive Science-Based Learning Design for Solving Societal Issues through Earth Science

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in earth science and social science concepts
context.additional_context: Pre-professionals in medical/legal/technical fields aim to understand connections between earth science and social issues, acquiring knowledge applicable to actual work

learning_goals: Learners can construct conceptual models explaining the interaction between physical terrain and climate change
Learners can analyze Earth science data to derive evidence-based solutions for societal issues (e.g., disaster response, resource management)
Learners can apply spatiotemporal data visualization and interpretation skills using digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
